ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We are also grateful to Eli Greenbaum (University of Texas at El Paso), Mathias Behangana (Makerere University), Michele Menegon (Trento Science Museum), Julian Kerbis Peterhans and John Bates (Chicago Field Museum) and the Charles Foley and Tim Davenport (Tanzania Mammal Atlas) for point location data they provided for the species distribution modelling.
